---
title: "Quizzes"
---

Details on Assignments for 432 will be posted before February 1.

There are three types of course assignments in 432:

1. Two Projects (Project 1 is due in late March, Project 2 at the end of the term)
2. Two Quizzes (Quiz A is in mid-March, Quiz B is at the end of the term)
3. Six Labs (the first five labs are mandatory, the final one is optional and can be done at any time during the semester)

As material becomes available, it will appear here.
